structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The creation of a basic coverage compensation fund pursuant to KRS 164.890 to 164.895 and the compliance with all other provisions of KRS 164.890 to 164.895 shall qualify the university as a self-insurer under the terms of KRS 304.40-330(4).
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 5.
